value:
$bEvBg_Chapter3_Hell|$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|What are you mumbling? You choose
to pray in the face of your death?
...I will allow you that much.$k$pI have not yet mastered the supreme
mercilessness commanded by Lady
Hel...as much as I hate to admit it.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|Have you finished? Then let us put
an end to this.$k$pWith your death, I will stand as ruler
of the dead, unchallenged.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|If you wish to derive your power
from my death as Mother once did,
then so be it.$k$pI cannot, however, allow you to have
your way with the lives of others.$k$pThat is why I must stand against you,
and stop you here—even if it means
I die in the process!$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|A noble gesture, but meaningless.
What do you hope to gain?$k$p...All this feels familiar. What is this
feeling? A memory of some soul Lady
Hel once sealed away, perhaps? Hm.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|What are you saying?$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|...Forget it. You are about to die.
There is no need for you to know.$k$pThe moment for talk has passed!$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|The time has come, Ymir!$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Yes!$k$p

$bEvBg_Chapter3_Hell|$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Unghh...$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|Hrrgh... I did not expect to need to
put forth such effort...$k$pI must take Eir's life as my own
quickly. Otherwise my own body
will soon fail...$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|Prepare yourself, Princess Eir!$k$p$Fo500,255,0,0,150|$Fi500|$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Aaahh...$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|Yes... I can feel your life-force
coursing through me! This must be
the power of the realm of life!$k$pHeh heh... Ah-hahaha! You have my
thanks, Princess Eir.$k$pWith this power at my command,
I will become the perfect, merciless
ruler of the realm of the dead!$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|...I cannot allow that.$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|Wh-who said that?!$k$pNo... It can't be. That voice came
from...within me!$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|I am Ymir, the dragon of the realm
of life. You could not perceive it,
but I was within Eir all along.$k$pWhen you took Eir's life as your
own, you drew me into you as well.$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|I did not choose this. But it was
Eir's wish that we defeat you, no
matter the cost.$k$pWe faced you, knowing full well the
futility of standing against you.
And we fell to you, as planned.$k$pAll so you would absorb Eir's
life-force...and with it, me.$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|No! You can't be— You intend to
destroy me from within?!$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|I'm sorry, Eir—sorry to have
caused you so much pain, time and
time again. I will end this now.$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_Weapon01,Face|You fool! Stop this! Forgive me,
Lady Hel!$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Good-bye, Eir. And farewell, my
beloved brethren, all of those who
once called the realm of life home.$k$pYou are free now... I only wish
I could see what you will do with
that freedom...$k$p$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|$Fi3000|Urghhh...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|She stirs.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|It seems you kept your promise,
Princess Eir.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Líf, Thrasir... I don't understand.$k$pTo have defeated Ganglöt, I was
meant to have died. There was no
way around it...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|That is how we were freed.
Thank you, Princess Eir.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|When we found you here, the spirit
of a woman stood lingering at
your side.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Ymir... It must have been Ymir!$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|No...$k$pThat was not the name she gave.
She said she was...your mother.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|My...mother?$k$pCould it be that the last soul
my mother had sealed away was...
her own?$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|She said she was once the queen
of the realm of life.$k$pGanglöt's death freed her,
but...she gave her life to you,
her daughter.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Then, that is why I'm still alive?
No... Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|We were to tell you her love would
live on, forever. With that request,
she disappeared.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|Mother... My real mother...$k$pI do not even remember her face,
and yet...she threw away her own
life to save mine...$k$pTogether, Ymir and Mother...they
saved me. I owe them everything.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|If that is how you feel, live on.
Live your life in a way that would
make them proud.$k$pYou have that power within you.$k$p$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|You're right. That is what I must do.$k$pLíf, Thrasir... What will you—$k$p*gasp*$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMEID_開花エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Bloom01,Face|$Fi1500|They're gone.$k$pThey, too, had their fates thrown
into chaos by Hel...$k$pYet they chose to fight, to rail
against the fate that was laid
upon them...$k$pI must do the same. I cannot linger
in my grief and sadness.$k$pI will live on, for the future. I will
do all I can with this gift of life
I've been given.$k$pAnd one day, I will return the realm
of life to its rightful state...$k$pHow I will make that a reality,
I do not yet know, but...$k$pI have a feeling that when I do,
I will meet you again, Ymir...$k$pHm. Strange... Having hope for the
future is new for me. I will need
to get used to this feeling.$k$pI know it is because you live
on inside me, Ymir—alongside my
true mother...$k$pI know I am not alone now, for
I have you both with me. Always.$k$pNow, we will return home, to the
Order of Heroes, where my friends
await me.$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse, hurry! This way!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Sharena, slow down! If you keep
running like that, you'll slip on the
snow and fall.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Huh? He's not here. Strange.$k$pI saw a winter envoy who looked
just like Zacharias over this way.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It must have been someone else.
I find it difficult to imagine Zacharias
participating in a festival like this.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|But there is a possibility, isn't there?!$k$pEven if he was a Zacharias who'd
come from another world, I would...
I would like to see him again.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Sharena...$k$pI would like that too.$k$pAll right. We'll split up and look
for him! I'll head this direction.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_冬祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Winter22,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|*huff* *puff* I can't find
Zacharias anywhere!$k$p*sneeze*$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We should head home, Sharena.
The sun set some time ago. You'll
catch cold if we don't head in soon.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|But, Alfonse... Fine. You're right.$k$pMaybe...I did just see someone else
and imagine it was him...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Alfonse! Look, look! Presents!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You got one too? I woke up to this
resting near the hearth.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Mysterious presents, delivered
anonymously... Could it be?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The thought crossed my mind.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|That winter envoy I saw... He delivered
these presents!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|All while staying out of sight, keeping
his distance. How like Zacharias.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|That's right! I'm so happy, my heart
is going to burst!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Zacharias, wherever
you are. You've made this an
unforgettable winter festival.$k$pI hope I can thank you in person...
some day.$k$p
